name: TIDY TEDDY
description:
Here is the official Tidy Teddy, it's cute and kissable bit like Andy Farley was in 2003. This quality bear stands at 32cm high and has moveable limbs and lovely soft fur. Its a limited edition and will make a perfect Christmas present for a friend, lover or neighbour.

Limited Edition - and the Ideal gift at just £16.99

You can also but the Tidy Teddy with the Ideal Teddy for £30.00 (making a £3.98 saving)

name: THE IDEAL TEDDY
description:
Perfect Christmas gift, the Ideal Teddy is loveable and cuddly, a bit like a fat girlfriend or and elderly grandparent. It's a high quality product that stands 3cm high with moveable limbs (legs & arms). It's very kissable and could become and sort of imaginary friend if you are the lonely type. 

Limited Edition - and the Ideal gift at just £16.99

You can also but the Tidy Teddy with the Ideal Teddy for £30.00 (making a £3.98 saving)

name: IDEAL & TIDY TEDDYS
description:
BUY BOTH FOR JUST £30 and save £3.98
Perfect Christmas gifts or even a treat for yourself, these two loveable Teddy's are looking for a home. They are 32 cm high and have been loving made. High quality and moveable limbs (like a real bear). Having both these two on the your home will make you the envy of all your friends and distant relatives. 

LIMITED EDITION - BUY NOW FOR CHRISTMAS

name: FOR HEAVENS SAKE - The Ultimate Heavens Cry Collection
description:
THE FINAL STOCK - last chance to get this collectors item. 100 copies extra for the people who got upset and missed out.

For the ultimate Heavens Cry purist, a limited edition one off CD compilation that every Tidy fan should own. Two discs containing every version of Til Tears Do Us Part worth owning. 2 discs, 1 track with over 20 versions and remixes. This collection has some unreleased gems as well as the sort after Orchestral and Piano versions played by the Flash Harry Orchestra.(perfect for weddings and funerals) Also featured is the legendary Tidy Boys mash up played at every weekender since 2002. 

This album comes with a lovely Christmas card signed by the Tidy Boys. Collectors item not to be re-sold on Ebay.

FOR HEAVENS SAKE ALBUM track list

DISC ONE

name: ELECTRIK IBIZA mixed by Scott Attrill & Technikal
description:
Mixed By Scott Attrill & Technikal

Label: Noize Recordings 

Electrik Ibiza is the hottest hard dance album of 2013 and a brand new concept presented to you by Riot Recordings 
Showcasing mixes from two of the best DJ’s in the game Scott Attrill and Technikal this album has everything and more to satisfy your needs as it presents both the future anthems of tomorrow and the classic anthems of yesterday, providing over two hours of unadulterated 
Each mix is perfectly structured and mixed as we would expect from the artists involved, Scott Attrill delivers an epic tracklist featuring many unreleased tracks from Riot Recordings / Traffic Records / Noize Recordings and features artists that are on top of their game right now including Joe Rogers / Technikal / Fullerlove / Steve Hill / Skritek / Energy Syndicate / Tekno Tom & more… 
Technikal gets right to the point and offers a relentless onslaught of some of the biggest Hard Trance anthems ever, including tracks from Rob Tissera / Steve Hill / Phil York / Guyver / Pierre Pinnar / Paul Maddox and others! In all this compilation is essential for anyone that loves their big room tunes and that harder / faster injection.

Track Listing / Running Order

Mix 1 – Mixed By Scott Attrill (Anthems of the future)

01.  Don’t Go – Scott Attrill 
02. Check This – Scott Attrill 
03. Siren ‘138’ – Scott Attrill 
04. Scream – Scott Attrill 
05. Sexy Girl – Scott Attrill 
06. Girls Love Techno (Scott Attrill Remix) – Scott Attrill 
07. Let Me Hear You Shout (Scott Attrill Remix) – Joe Rogers 
08. Stingray – Scott Attrill 
09. Pigeon – Fullerlove 
10. Let’s Do This – Scott Attrill V’s Steve Hill & Technikal 
11. Yano Life – Leon Clarke 
12. Danger – Scott Attrill 
13. This Is Sick! – Scott Attrill 
14. Alarm – Scott Attrill 
15. Smash – Scott Attrill 
16. Boom – Scott Attrill 
17. Need You (Scott Attrill Remix) – Nu Raverz 
18. Growl – Energy Syndicate 
19. Sit On My Bass – Rachel Red & Angeleyes

Mix 2 – Mixed By Technikal (Anthems of the past)

01. Supersonic - Technikal vs MDA & Spherical 
02. Back 2 The Old Skool - Technikal 
03. Everyday (Steve Hill vs Technikal Mix) - Masif DJs 
04. Song For You - Technikal 
05. U Got The Love (Steve Hill vs Technikal Remix) - Hyperlogic 
06. Don't Say Goodbye - Technikal feat. Rob Tissera 
07. Mad & Confused (Guyver Remix) - Technikal & Marc French 
08. Big Sky - Nathalie & Technikal 
09. More & More - Kym Ayres feat. Technikal 
11. Free At Last - Steve Hill vs Technikal

name: In An Ideal World Vol. 1
description: IDEAL is a new music and entertainment brand conceived and created by Amadeus Mozart & Andy Pickles who are the duo gave birth to Tidy Trax back in 1995. As with Tidy, Ideal is more than just a record label, its a new exciting community and club which will change the way the traditional digital label and events work. The first compilation album release is a showcase of not just new and forthcoming IDEAL releases but also the global sound of Hard House which is currently having a massive second wave boom in the UK. In An Ideal World Vol. 1 see's the men at the very forefront of the IDEAL revolution with a double mix packed full of brand new Hard House delights. From hard funk to hands in the air to heads down 'dance till you drop' bangers, The Tidy Boys & BK take you on a Hard House journey that will keep your foot tapping until your ankle hurts and your right shoe lace comes dangerously loose. CD ONE: TIDY BOYS 01 Swack - Drop The Bomb 02 Whoredry Roberts - Off The Rails (Sam Townend Remix) 03 Ben Carr- Do It like This 04 Sam Townend & Klubfiller - Banger 05 Stone Cold - Rock The Disco (Lox & Leigh Green Remix) 06 Ross Homson - Politically Incorrect (Technikal Remix) 07 Lox & Leigh Green - Just Get Loose 08 Ben Carr - Instrumental 09 Kronos - Illusion 10 JP & Jukesy - I Can't Stand IT 11 Mmax Mozart & Technikal - Live Again 12 Ross Homson - Cock-A-Hoop 13 Astrobass- False Alarm 14 Rockin Russ - The Tape 15 Rob Tissera, Ozy & Kye Shand - Honey Child 16 Charlie Bosh - The Rhythm 17 Venkman & Jon BW - Lift Me Up CD TWO: BK 1. Paul Maddox & Ben Stevens – In Your Hands (Olive Grooves Danger Dub) 2. Ross Homson – Stop, Drop & Roll 3. Dave Curtis – Crash Test 4. BK & Andy Farley – Feeling 5  Trade Baby vs Amp Attack - You Gotta Be Movin 6. BK & Anne Savage – Back 2 Basics 7. BK & Max Mozart – Generation (Original Mix) 8. Knuckleheadz – House Rocca (Steve Hill & Technikal Remix) 9. Ross Homson – Bitter & Fisted 10. BK & Anne Savage – Testify (HH Mix) 11  BK – I Need Love 12  BK – God's Child 13 Phlash! feat Steve Hill - Frantic Theme (Get A Life) (BK's 3am Frantic Remix) 14. Lucy Fur – Lucy In The Sky With Hoover 15. Chris C – Freefall (Ben Stevens & Adam M Remix) You can download a digital version of the album HERE

name: JUSTIN BOURNE SHOE HORN
description:
Everyone knows Justin as the hard house legend who brought us tracks like Drop The Dime and Strapped In, but not many of you will know he has very fat heels. Justin was born (pardon the pun) with extra large swollen angles and feet, a disability which has made it very difficult for him to put on his favourite style of shoe or trainer. Working in conjunction with a local plastics firm and 3 ex-staff from the Milton Keynes Dolcis Justin has come up with the perfect solution, his new flexible long shoe horn. Perfect for people who don't like to bend down to far or DJs who like to swap shoes while driving to gigs.

Currently only comes in yellow - blue and red are currently in production.

name: KEEPING THE RAVE ALIVE - The Album Mixed By Kutski
description:
The Uk’s no 1 hard dance dj Kutski presents his own weekly radio show ‘Keeping The Rave Alive’ showcasing 360 Degree’s of the harder styles, ranging from hard dance through the hardstyle and hardcore with some oldschool thrown in for good measure.  Showcasing Kutski’s diversity as a dj he invites guests ranging from the biggest worldwide headliners along with the most underground names and fresh emerging talent to watch out for!

name: BREAKING FREE - Rodi Style
description:
Canadian hard dance producer Rodi Style’s debut artist album see’s months of hard work brought to life with a 14 track album.  Aptly titled “Breaking Free”, music on the album seeks to break barriers with genre blending tracks that meld influences from Tech Trance, Electro, Progressive and House into the Hard Dance Rodi Style is known for.  From the soft melodic "Intro", the highly energetic title track "Breaking Free feat. Sarah-Jane Neild (Armada)" to the no nonsense Hard House "the growler", Rodi Style shows why he is one of the Hard Dance industry's leading producers.

TRACKLIST:
Intro / collide/1up/feeling/illusion/breaking free/sound language/countdown/erase/by your side/can't get high/the growler/won't you/outro

Mixmag - Album Of the Month - March 2013 10/10
“An artist album of this quality is out of reach of most producers 10/10” - Album of the month

Cluboverload review
“Artists albums are hard. They are rare. However when done right they are a beautiful thing. If every artist album was as pleasurable as this one to listen to I would welcome more with open arms.”

name: SCOTT ATTRILL - Neon Disco Soldiers
description:
It’s hard to believe that its been almost three years since Scott’s previous album, the much hailed and ground-breaking masterpiece ‘Noize’ was delivered to the World. Now though, the wait is finally over for Attrill to present the eagerly awaited new collection, ‘Neon Disco Soldiers’. 

As with 'Noize', 'Mega' & 'Bass Junkie' before it, this album is packed with tracks that are well thought, well produced and expertly crafted, the flow of the album works on so many levels and will keep you enthralled, hooked and entertained from start to finish. Once again the bar has been lifted and standards raised in terms of hard electronic music and each individual musical piece once again contains originality, charisma and charm with that unmistakable style and fusion of sounds that only Scott Attrill can create.

Tunes such as ‘BeBop’, ‘Sound Of Silence’, ‘The Wall (Get The Fuck)’, ‘The Elements’ and ‘Punky Disco’ immediately single themselves out as recordings that could well be played on any dance floor at any club in the World, then there are all out peak time tharashers like ‘The Slammer’, ‘Gameboy’, ‘Bleep Me Again’ and ‘Screech’. Add to these the melodic and uplifting tough trance injected tracks such as ‘Chimera’, 'Elasticity', 'Electrik Dreaming’and 'Felicita', the acid onslaught of ‘Play The Game’ and then to finish the beautifully crafted and epic production that is ‘Easy Junkie’ (The End), and you have quite simply one of the best and most complete set of tracks Scott has ever presented. It’s all pretty spine tingling stuff and there is without a shadow of a doubt something for all.

The album is 15 tracks, all mixed to perfection as we have come to expect but this time there is also the added bonus of receiving an extra track for free if you purchase the complete bundle and mix from download stores. 

The ‘Attrill’ revolution continues and this is yet another milestone piece to add to what has become a sensational musical saga, until the next edition…
NEON DISCO SOLDIERS!

Neon Disco Soldiers Tracklist / Running Order

Intro
Punky Disco  
Felicita 
The Wall (Get The Fuck) 
Sound Of Silence 
Bleep Me Again 
Electrik Dreaming   
BeBOP  
The Elements 
Slammer  
Elasticity  
Screech 
Game Boy    
Play The Game 
Chimera
Easy Junkie (The End)

name: A vs B The Album
description:
Everybody should know who Ben Stevens & Adam M are by now. They have both established themselves in Hardhouse scene over the last decade as 2 of the Hardest solo acts on the circuit.
But then 1 cold winters day in Manchester 2009....

Adam & Ben spent a day in the studio together, some sort of chemical reaction or phenomenon must have happened in there that day (investigations are still on-going) The outcome of their studio collaboration together was the massive track"BAD MAN" This was the start of a very special studio relationship that continued to create various modern day Hardhouse anthems such Why Can't You See/ Mind Bender/ My F-Ing House/ Massiveness/ It Began In Rotherham & Covonia (Winner of 2011 Hardhouse Awards Best Track)They have also done some huge remix projects since 2009, Their massive remix of Chris C - Freefall for Tidy Trax & Their updates of the 2 rave anthems N-Trance - Set You Free & Cenith X - Feel.

What next... An idea sparked for a new LIVE show & the name A vs B was born. They decided that the best possible way for them both to showcase their music & to take things to the next level would be to do a LIVE show. This would not only give them total control over every element in each set but also the ability to add almost anything they wanted, including the ability to do live editing & remixing on the fly. The possibilities are endless....

Now in 2012 with the release of the 1st A vs B Album around the corner, every A vs B set is jam packed full of brand new & unheard music, these guys are most definitely the hottest thing on the Hardhouse scene right now!
Tracklist: 
01: A vs B - Miracle Maker 
02: A vs B - Gap Attack 
03: Ben Stevens - Attack (Adam M Remix) 
04: A vs B - Trouble In Wonderland 
05: A vs B - We're Gonna Make It 
06: Adam M & Gary O'Connor - Drop It (Ben Stevens Remix) 
07: A vs B - Sonic Rampage 
08: A vs B - Massive Volume 
09: A vs B - Double Drop 
10: A vs B - Welcome To The Pleasure Gnome

For DJ Bookings please contact Sam @ IDEAL Artists: bookings@idealartists.co.uk +44 (0)7950 383 528 www.idealartists.co.uk

name: Eddie Halliwell Comb & Case
description:
At last, by popular demand the Eddie Halliwell deluxe comb and leather case. With the UK weather becoming more and more unpredictable (especially high winds and rain) you never know when and where you will need a comb. There is nothing worst than turning up at a friends or relatives house with wind sweep hair - now the problem is solved.

Eddie has personally designed this product, making sure all the combs teeth are firm yet soft on the scalp. This comb is also used by other DJs and producers, including: Brandon Block, Da Hool, Ian M, Sean Tyas and Naline and Kane. Limited stock available, the case also comes in brown and orange.

name: Ferry Corsten Oven Glove
description:
The hottest name in Dance music has the coolest new products, Ferry Corsten presents the ultimate protective oven glove. Originally designed by Ferry and his mum back in the Spring of 2007 this has taken years of product testing to get the perfect kitchen glove. Ferry once badly burnt his right hand lifting out a very hot tray of chicken dippers, he was unable to DJ or wipe his own arse for 3 weeks and it took several years before he felt confident to clap his hands at concerts or family parties.

So you can understand why Ferry has come up with the best Oven Glove in Europe - there is a 28 day trial, buy it and test it on piping hot dishes and fairly warm plates - we guarantee it wont hurt your hands or fingers.

Limited stock comes with a signed picture of Ferry in his nan's garden.

name: Andy Whitby Engraved Shepherds Crook
description:
This lovely Shepherd Crook has been hand carved by middle aged women with no ovaries. Andy Whitby, a slightly famous hard house DJ known for his fast music and white teeth, proudly presents this masterpiece design. Andy's name is clearly visible from a distance and looks great leaning against a fence or wall. 

If your a fan of Andy Whitby or a budding Shepherd this gift is perfect for you. Limited stock available.
